thread.title: Bosch Delivered Emissions-Related Software to Volkswagen, Warned of Illegal Use -- Report
thread.title_full: Bosch Delivered Emissions-Related Software to Volkswagen, Warned of Illegal Use -- Report

author: morningstar.com
title: Bosch Delivered Emissions-Related Software to Volkswagen, Warned of Illegal Use -- Report
text:
By Friedrich Geiger
BERLIN--Robert Bosch GmbH delivered the software that Volkswagen AG (VOW.XE, VLKAY) used for manipulating car emissions, but had warned of illegal use, according to a newspaper report.
Bosch delivered the software for test purposes and told Volkswagen in a letter in 2007 that the planned use would be illegal, Bild am Sonntag reported Sunday. Internal auditors at Volkswagen found the letter, according to the German newspaper.
Spokesmen for Bosch and Volkswagen declined to comment on the report.
Volkswagen installed in some 11 million vehicles engine-management software that made bench-test emissions appear lower than they were on the road. The German car maker replaced its chief executive this week after the manipulation was discovered.
Write to Friedrich Geiger at friedrich.geiger@wsj.com
 27, 2015 09:05 ET (13:05
